titleStmt.title: Interactive Fiction in the Humanities Classroom: How to Create Interactive Text Games Using Twine
titleStmt.author: Gabi Kirilloff

sourceDesc.p: Born digital, in a markdown format. This lesson is original.

abstract.p: This lesson provides strategies for incorporating game creation into the classroom. The first half of the lesson discusses the challenges and benefits of teaching game creation while the second half includes a technical tutorial for Twine, an open source game creation tool.
